overlayTutorial: 1. Add this page as a data statistics overlay in ACT.
obsTutorial: 2. Open OBS → Tools → WebSocket Server Settings → Enable WebSocket Server → Show Connection Info → Obtain Port and Password
inputTutorial: 3. Can't type? First click on ACT, then click on this floating window to enter normally.
hideTutorial: After completing all settings, in OverlayPlugin, uncheck [Show Overlay] to hide this page.
